Log in
December 2024 Edition
Zapier's latest
Explore the latest product updates and app news for smarter building.
What's new
Customize test data in all your Zap steps
In addition to editing your trigger data, you can now edit the test data in all other steps, via the "Data out" tab. Now building Zaps is smoother than ever.
Try it now
More powerful chatbots
New Chatbots features! Add linked buttons, auto-organize knowledge uploads, and connect your chatbot to apps like Slack and Gmail via the Integrations tab.
Check out what's new
AI summaries for Zap changes
Now when you create a new version of a Zap, AI will automatically generate a summary of edits. You can see what's changed at a glance and pick up where you left off.
Try it now
Spotlight
Use Zapier in Webflow
We embedded Zapier directly in Webflow's platform, so you can automate publishing, lead capture, and content updates.
Learn how →
Updated learning path: Zapier basics
We've added 13 new video lessons and updated our build-along demos with new use cases.
Check it out →
Webinar: AI voicenotes
In our latest webinar recording, you'll learn how to transform your ideas into actionable tasks using AI and your voice.
Watch the replay →
New and noteworthy apps
Highlighting 12 new integrations and 13 updates, including…
Webflow
Automate your Webflow site with Zapier without leaving your website builder!
Explore Webflow integrations →
monday.com
The Get File Column Files search action now returns all files and shows the correct search status if no files are found.
Explore monday.com integrations →
Google Calendar
With the new Retrieve Event by ID action, you have more flexibility in your Zaps to search for recurring events and other meetings on your calendar.
Explore Google Calendar integrations →
Ironclad
Spend less time chasing approvals and keep your contracting processes moving with Ironclad's new Zapier integration.
Explore Ironclad integrations →
Funnelr
Coaches, creators, and entrepreneurs can automate marketing and sales processes further in Funnelr, from initial outreach to paid subscriptions.
Explore Funnelr integrations →
Discover the latest
So many updates, so little space: Join the Zapier Community or visit our Help Center for even more product updates.
Got a question? Send us a message
